amendment.description: Amendment sought to delay designation of the trail until all environmental analyses and the review required by Public Law 107-338 have been completed by the Secretary of the Interior.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-519 to delay designation of the trail until all environmental analyses and the review required by Public Law 107-338 have been completed by the Secretary of the Interior.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
